text: I'm proud to be one of 90 @HouseDemWomen in this trailblazing 116th Congress. During #WomensHistoryMonth, as we honor the women whose shoulders we stand on, we'll keep fighting for: Equal Pay Better health care Reproductive freedom Equality for all

This is good news for children & families. As I've said before, 'Remain in Mexico' is inconsistent w/@DHSgov's authority & inhumanely forces thousands to wait in dangerous conditions before their asylum claims are heard. It's a harmful policy & I’m glad the court rejected it.

.@RepAnnaEshoo & I know the widespread support for the Online Privacy Act is a rallying call for decisive action to protect Americans’ privacy. We must put an end to unfair business practices that deny users control over their own data. More http://bit.ly/3cecFK6

Proud to stand w/@ThisSpudsForYou @RepNewhouse @CongMikeSimpson @RepJimmyPanetta & @RepLaMalfa urging the Senate to take action on our bipartisan, House-passed Farm Workforce Modernization Act. #FutureFarmWorkforce

The Trump Administration’s efforts to drastically decrease refugee admissions has gone against our country's longstanding commitment to refugee resettlement. Tune in to a live hearing now on the state of the U.S. Refugee Program

Yesterday, @RepAnnaEshoo, @CASOSvote, @PrezPapazian & I celebrated the new @CityofSanJose Voting Center at @SJSU & held an Election Security Town Hall. We're all committed to securing our elections & making them more transparent. ICYMI: http://bit.ly/2HINkdl

Millions of Californians have been impacted by devastating fires or experienced disruptive power outages. Today, @HouseScience passed measures to: help prevent wildfires provide support during power shutoffs establish a grid tech workforce program

The Trump Administration's #MuslimBan has not made us safer. It has weakened America's standing in the world & runs contrary to our country’s moral & philosophical foundation. You can watch the #NoBan Act live debate this morning
Today, the FY 2021 #TrumpBudget came out. From manufacturing to medical research, it's clear the President's words don't match his intended actions: http://bit.ly/2UIfkp0

I’ve worked on 3 impeachments in my life: -Nixon resigned in disgrace -Clinton apologized to the nation & repented -Trump says his behavior was “perfect,” keeps trying to cheat our elections, & says he has a right to abuse his power That’s why we must #DefendOurDemocracy

It’s an honor to serve as a manager alongside @RepValDemings & @RepSylviaGarcia. The fact that this group better reflects the diversity of the American public than ever before is a welcome development.

Executive privilege cannot be used to prevent a witness who is willing to testify from appearing, and certainly not one who no longer works in government. It’s not a gag order. And witnesses testify on national security all the time. Bolton has a right to testify if he wants to.

Impeachment is a grave & solemn matter. It's a stress test for our democracy. I hope every Senator is prepared to seriously consider & vote honestly with an open mind for the future of our democracy. (3/3)

As the only member of Congress who has participated as part of the Judiciary Committees for all three modern impeachment proceedings, I must be clear that this is not something I sought or relish. (2/3)

It is with honor & determination that I accept this responsibility to fulfill my oath of office to hold the president accountable as an impeachment manager alongside @RepAdamSchiff, @RepSylviaGarcia, @RepValDemings, @RepJeffries, @RepJerryNadler & @RepJasonCrow. (1/3)

It's official @HouseJudiciary is starting an investigation into the Trump Admin’s "Remain in Mexico" policy, which threatens the health & safety of legitimate asylum seekers, including women, children, & families.

I’m fighting for people living with pre-existing conditions in CA-19 & all around the country. If the GOP’s Texas v US lawsuit strikes down the Affordable Care Act, millions of Americans will lose vital protections & access to care. We must #ProtectOurCare!

260 people from Santa Clara County sent me letters of support for the PFAS Action Act, which I co-sponsored. It requires the @EPA to: Stem the flow of PFAS contamination into the enviro Identify health risk associated with PFAS Limit human exposure to PFAS

Every day, millions of Americans are exposed to unsafe levels of PFAS in their drinking water. Today, I voted to prevent the spread of these forever chemicals. Next, the Senate should join us in protecting public health.

Since Congress has not authorized military force against Iran, my vote for @RepSlotkin's War Powers Resolution was an easy one that follows our Constitution. We cannot have high-risk provocations of war without Congressional debate.

“My kids shouldn’t experience such things,” Ms. Hekmati said. “They are US citizens. This is not OK.” She is 100% correct. This is not OK at all, & I'm working w/@RepJayapal @HouseJudiciary @OversightDems & @HomelandDems to demand answers for families.

Thanks to everyone who took the time to reach out last year! I’m honored to work for engaged citizens who care about the direction of our country. In 2020, I plan to continue fighting #ForThePeople of Santa Clara County & listening to your views. https://lofgren.house.gov/contact
On a policy basis, there is reason to be concerned that this precipitous action may result in an unwanted new war that drags America into further military hostilities. 3/3

When responding to an attack or an imminent threat, the President may act, but must consult w/bipartisan Congressional leaders. Shockingly, Pres. Trump consulted only w/Republican Congressional leaders, an ominous departure that has chilling implications for our democracy. 2/3

The War Powers Act & our Constitution require that approval from Congress be obtained before starting an attack & a war. The President’s unwillingness to comply with the rule of law has real-life consequences for America. 1/3

2 years ago, Republicans rushed their #GOPTaxScam into law, putting giant corporations & billionaires over working families. 2 years later, wealth inequality in America is even worse. @HouseDemocrats are fighting for an economy that works for everyone, not just the privileged.

Announcing CA-19’s @CongressionalAC winner! Avi’s Infinity News app is a creative & tech-savvy way of ensuring the public focuses on facts. I commend him for putting his skillset to use on a topic that matters around the world. #Congress4CS http://bit.ly/2Q2TkkH

I’ve worked on two prior presidential impeachments. This third time brings me no joy. It is a solemn, but necessary occasion. The President abused his power to upend the Constitutional order. It is our responsibility to use the tool our Founders gave us to preserve it.

Spoke to @HardballChris about the mood in DC & how this is really a depressing day. It's a day when we, as Members of Congress, are required, under our oaths of office, to hold the president to account. When we are obligated to #DefendOurDemocracy.

The deadline to enroll in health insurance through Covered California has been extended to midnight on December 20! Make sure you’re taking a look to find the best health care plan for you & your family. #GetCovered
Today I voted to proceed on articles of impeachment against Donald Trump. My reflection

I applaud my colleagues in the Senate for following the House’s lead & officially recognizing the Armenian genocide. The persecution & murder of Armenians at the hands of the Turkish government was a crime against humanity. Proud that we are finally on the right side of history.

I have said from day one that the Trump Administration’s Migrant Protection Protocols are illegal, inhumane, & just flat out wrong. This tragedy was avoidable. This illegal program should be stopped today.
This is a serious moment for our country. My full remarks from this evening’s @HouseJudiciary markup of articles of impeachment against Donald Trump

Our #FutureFarmWorkforce bill just passed the House of Representatives! Join @RepNewhouse, @SpeakerPelosi & I, along w/bipartisan reps, ag groups, & farmworkers as we discuss our historic compromise to help America’s farms. WATCH

Honored to stand w/@RepNewhouse & the rest of my colleagues on both sides of the aisle who have worked tirelessly on this historic compromise solution for farmers & farmworkers across the US. My statement on the House floor in support of our #FutureFarmWorkforce bill

Yes, it's true. We work together, across the aisle, in Congress! We want to highlight our progress in the hopes that it may pave the way for future compromises. #FutureFarmWorkforce @UFWupdates w/ @RepNewhouse

Simply acknowledging #HumanRightsDay today isn’t enough. China is undermining freedoms for #HongKongers + others. Saudi Arabia killed a US journalist w/impunity. Our Border Patrol has let children die in custody. Rights are under threat around the globe. We cannot be silent.

2 years ago, @POTUS & @FCC repealed #NetNeutrality rules, which means your provider can block, throttle, & charge extra for internet access. @HouseDemocrats passed a bill to reinstate fair protections 244 days ago. It sits untouched in the Senate. @SenateGOP: #DoYourJob
I also want to thank leaders @RepTerriSewell who authored #HR4 & @RepMarciaFudge who collected evidence from around the country to ensure the #VRAA will #RestoreTheVote!

Today @HouseDemocrats stood against voter suppression & passed #HR4 to restore the #VotingRights Act. The right to vote is at the very core of our democracy. We won’t let it be compromised by adversaries abroad or undermined here at home. #RestoreTheVote

The death of this child is heartbreaking & appears to have been entirely preventable. This video proves CBP lied to us about their treatment of Carlos, the sixth child to die in U.S. custody in under a year. CBP must be held accountable & this must never happen again.

This is only the third time in modern history that @HouseJudiciary has assumed the grave responsibility of holding #impeachmenthearings. I’ve been there all three times. I'm questioning witnesses about the Constitutional grounds for presidential impeachment LIVE

Today @HouseJudiciary will examine the Constitutional framework put in place to address presidential misconduct ( getting ready to begin). @HouseIntel has laid out the facts. Our job is to assess the level of danger posed to the Constitution & our national security.

I'm evaluating testimony w/a grave sense of duty to the Constitution... ...& I remind my colleagues of the words in this report (http://bit.ly/1974report): "The purpose of #impeachment is not personal punishment; its function is primarily to maintain constitutional government.”
I don’t often agree with Judge Andrew Napolitano, but I do agree with his top-line assessment here. We must #DefendOurDemocracy

Happy Small Business Saturday! Family-run small businesses in Santa Clara County are the backbone of our communities & our country’s economy. Be sure to support them & #shopsmall this holiday season. What are your favorite local small businesses?
This #Thanksgiving, I want to share my family’s favorite pecan pie recipe - it’s very good, easy to make & even won first place at the Naglee Park July 4th Bake-Off! Hope you enjoy it.

The Trump Admin pursued its family separation policy knowing it lacked the ability to keep track of separated children & parents. We will keep bringing DHS before us until we get to the bottom of this serious matter. Their callous cruelty is unacceptable. https://bit.ly/2QXU7W8

While @POTUS tweets away about us “doing nothing,” 300+ bipartisan bills passed by @HouseDemocrats are languishing in the Senate because Mitch McConnell said he won’t do anything without Trump’s approval. They need to stop projecting & start passing our commonsense legislation.

Grateful to community members & elected officials who paved the way for @SCCgov's new Vietnamese-American Service Center. This facility will help connect our community’s Vietnamese-Americans w/health & social services. The first in the nation & it’s in our district!

Violence against women & girls is a serious & unacceptable global problem. That’s why I am once again a cosponsor of the International Violence Against Women Act, which codifies US efforts to prevent & combat gender-based violence worldwide. Passage of #IVAWA is long overdue.

Since the start of this year, we’ve passed more than 275 bipartisan pieces of legislation #ForThePeople. They’re all stuck in the Senate, sitting on Mitch McConnell’s desk. That’s inexcusable. @senatemajldr: #DoYourJob

Republicans say @HouseDemocrats only care about impeachment. They’re wrong. Just this week, we’ve: Advanced my bipartisan ag workforce bill Voted to fund gov & give our troops a raise Voted to defend democracy in #HongKong Introduced a new bill to protect refugees
Fantastic news! This new investment will help make Silicon Valley’s Airport safer & more beneficial for travelers & first responders. More

This is un-American. Right now, there are more refugees than any time since WWII. It's a crisis. The US used to lead the world in offering protection to victims of terror. I introduced the #Refugee Protection Act w/@SenatorLeahy today to get us back to that American tradition.

Documented white nationalists don’t belong in any presidential administration. Stephen Miller is a bigot who has used his position to demonize refugees & dismantle our immigration system. He must go. Period.

Working with my colleagues to fix the damage done to our refugee programs by @POTUS & Stephen Miller. America should once again be assisting the world's most vulnerable people. #UnitedWithRefugees #SaveAsylum

This momentous vote today in the @HouseJudiciary Committee moves my #FutureFarmWorkforce proposal w/@RepNewhouse forward! Soon, all Members will vote on the first bipartisan compromise in decades to improve America’s agricultural labor programs & laws.

Last month, @HouseDemocrats voted in support of democracy in #HongKong. Today, the legislation passed both chambers of Congress. The rights of #HongKongers are being violently repressed. This cannot be ignored. Anyone who cares about human rights should #StandWithHongKong

The workplace conditions described by Sidronio are not sustainable. We need to ensure that the working men & women who feed America are protected & treated fairly. #FarmWorkerStories #FutureFarmWorkforce
We need to recognize the dignity & contributions of hardworking agricultural laborers like Alma. #FarmWorkerStories #FutureFarmWorkforce

Amparo is right. Thousands of agricultural laborers are living & working in fear & it’s destabilizing farms across the country. We need to provide them w/certainty. #FarmWorkerStories #FutureFarmWorkforce
Farmworkers like Adelaida are the backbone of our agricultural economy. We cannot ignore them. #FarmWorkerStories #FutureFarmWorkforce
Farmworkers like Jesús feed the nation. It’s important that we listen to their stories & provide agricultural laborers w/fairness. #FarmWorkerStories #FutureFarmWorkforce

Today @HouseJudiciary will consider our bipartisan Farm Workforce Modernization Act. It is essential for Congress to work together to address our nation’s future farm labor needs. Watch #FutureFarmWorkforce

Under no metric is Guatemala deemed safe. It certainly doesn’t meet the legal standards for safe third country agreements. Sending vulnerable families there is the latest illegal attempt by @POTUS & Stephen Miller to destroy our asylum system.

Reminder: @HouseIntel Cmte hears more #impeachment testimony today. As a member of @HouseJudiciary, I'm listening like you are. (Live @https://intelligence.house.gov) Up now: Lt. Col. Vindman will discuss what he heard directly on Trump’s call w/Ukraine. #DefendOurDemocracy

This piece explains key impeachment testimony so far (which paints a picture of a pressure campaign to corrupt our democracy): https://nyti.ms/32XNG87 As @SpeakerPelosi said, if Trump has something that's exculpatory, he should make it known as we work to #DefendOurDemocracy.

Pleasure to meet w/San Jose Valley Christian Schools faculty member Danny Kim today. Danny coached an award-winning team of CA-19 STEM students & young pioneers in the field of ocean engineering. Thank you for mentoring the next generation of innovators!

Great to meet w/#UFW members who are in D.C. to advocate for our bipartisan Farm Workforce Modernization Act. Honored to author this bill that will bring stability to America’s farms & the workers who produce our food. #FutureFarmWorkforce
The facts are damning &, so far, not contested. We must keep the process going in a serious, methodical way to #DefendOurDemocracy.

On this first day of public hearings for the #impeachment inquiry, I spoke w/@RaziaIqbal on @BBCworldservice about how we must #DefendOurDemocracy. Full interview: https://bbc.in/2Qg8hBD (starts @6:44)
Here’s an interesting read on the Trump-Erdogan relationship… https://www.nytimes.com/reuters/2019/11/12/world/europe/12reuters-turkey-usa-trump-erdogan.html?partner=IFTTT

Last time Erdogan visited DC, his bodyguards assaulted Americans exercising their right to protest. I immediately called for the arrest of these thugs & revocation of their visas at the time & I’m appalled that Trump has welcomed this oppressor back without any repercussions.

Today, I was proud to Chair a @HouseAdm_Dems markup to unanimously pass H.R. 1980, the Smithsonian Women’s History Museum Act. Women make up 51% of the population – it’s long past due that we have a national museum to tell #HERstory!

Proud to introduce the Survivors Bill of Rights in the States Act with @RepSpeier- building on the success @RiseNowUS & I achieved in 2016 to guarantee rights for survivors in federal law. This new bill encourages states to follow suit & support survivors.

Happy #VeteransDay to all who have served our country. @HouseDemocrats have passed 20+ bills to support veterans & their families. From expanding VA suicide prevention programs to ensuring veteran access to childcare, we are committed to our servicemembers when they return home.

Legal protections for whistleblowers are crucial in order to fight waste, fraud, & abuse in government. This has long-been a nonpartisan point of agreement, & should remain so, especially during these serious impeachment proceedings.

Thank you Larry. @RepAnnaEshoo and I know that privacy for online consumers has been nonexistent & we’re working together to change that. Our #DataPrivacyAct will give you control of your personal data by making legitimate changes to tech industry business practices.
“Silicon Valley has long been a cradle of innovation and it’s nice to see two Silicon Valley lawmakers introduce an innovative bill that could benefit Americans” - @larrymagid
The names "Biden" & "Clinton" keep appearing in these depositions. It makes Trump's goal clear – get Ukraine to smear his political opponents. #DefendOurDemocracy

"I trust the fact that the Ukrainians didn’t know that aid had been held"- Jim Jordan 11/6/19 I encourage Rep. Jordan to read through these interviews. Top Ukrainian officials certainly knew. It was central to Trump's pressure campaign & it almost worked. #DefendOurDemocracy
The deposition from US Ambassador to Ukraine, Bill Taylor, makes it clear that this pressure campaign was lead directly by President Trump. We need to #DefendOurDemocracy.

Thank you @EPICprivacy for grading the #OnlinePrivacyAct the top consumer data protection bill in Congress. @RepAnnaEshoo & I consulted with 100+ academics, businesses, regulators & advocacy organizations to craft a comprehensive set of protections for users & their data.
Congrats @Apple for joining @Google & @facebook in committing billions to build housing people can afford.

Today @RepAnnaEshoo & I introduced the most robust data privacy bill to date. The #OnlinePrivacyAct protects users, encourages innovation, & restores trust in tech companies. More http://bit.ly/2NPfVAm

As Republicans falsely claim @HouseDemocrats only focus on impeachment, it’s important to note we’ve passed 300+ bills & counting #ForThePeople on key issues like: Gun Violence Healthcare Election Security Climate Change LGBTQ Rights @senatemajldr: #DoSomething

Fact: There are more refugees now than any time since WWII. Fact: Your 2020 refugee admissions level is the lowest in US history. Fact: There was bipartisan agreement in Congress to raise it. We were ignored. Your policy isn’t based on the facts. It shocks the conscience.

Working parents know better than anyone about the most pressing issues facing our country — & that’s why we need make it easier for working moms & dads to run for Congress. Proud to have supported @RepKatiePorter’s bill to ensure working families are better represented in DC.

Thank you @EzraKlein & @Voxdotcom for having me on to discuss my firsthand experience with the Nixon & Clinton impeachments. It’s vital that everyone understands what impeachment means as the House continues its fact-finding investigation to #DefendOurDemocracy #ForThePeople.

As a Congressional staffer during Nixon’s #impeachment, I saw a change happen – as the evidence piled up, Members of Congress had to confront the facts & their obligation to the Constitution. In the end, there may be a clear choice: defend Donald Trump or #DefendOurDemocracy.

Last week, @HouseDemocrats passed my #SHIELDAct to crack down on foreign interference in US elections. It’s the 3rd election security bill passed by the House to protect our democracy & now one of 300+ bills languishing in the #McConnellGraveyard.

As #DomesticViolenceAwarenessMonth comes to an end, my colleagues & I wore purple to show our support for the Violence Against Women Act. @HouseDemocrats voted to reauthorize #VAWA in April @senatemajldr continues blocking #VAWA, which puts lives at risk

It's important that everyone understands what #impeachment means as the House votes on procedures for our fact-finding mission. #Throwback to my chat on the @StephMillerShow about impeachment & Trump's misconduct. #TruthExposed #NoOneIsAboveTheLaw

Thanks to @RepNewhouse & all of the members on both sides of the aisle who spent months working w/me on this bipartisan solution for our #FutureFarmWorkforce. Republicans & Democrats working together for the good of the country is something to be proud of. : @meganululani

HAPPENING NOW: I’m introducing new legislation to address our nation’s agricultural labor needs. The Farm Workforce Modernization Act will provide stability for America’s farms & the workers who feed our nation. #FutureFarmWorkforce

HAPPENING SOON: We’re unveiling the Farm Workforce Modernization Act: a bipartisan bill to provide stability, predictability & fairness for America’s farms. Tune in live – in a half hour – 11:30am PST/2:30pm EST #FutureFarmWorkforce

300+ national security & foreign policy officials called it a “profound national security concern”. 17 Watergate prosecutors told us it met the same standard for Nixon’s impeachable conduct. Trump’s own former NSC Advisor said it was absolutely inappropriate. GOP: Take note

The #ArmenianGenocide is indisputable & its denial has been used to justify subsequent atrocities. I’ve supported genocide recognition efforts since I first came to Congress in 1994 & am proud to vote for #HRES296 on the House floor today. Passing this bill is long overdue.
The answer he should have given is simple: NO. I’m a @ConstitutionCtr Honorary Congressional Scholar & I don’t need legal jargon to come up with that one-word response.

We need to correct this injustice & honor the contributions of ALL of the men & women who defend our country. @HouseJudiciary is reviewing the impact of these immigration policies for veterans right now. Watch

In just 2 weeks, we'll be honoring those who served our country on #VeteransDay... ...& while this Administration makes a show of thanking servicemembers, they'll keep despicably deporting immigrants who fought in our military & blocking naturalizations. That's Un-American.

This is the next phase in our ongoing inquiry to determine whether Donald Trump should be impeached. The American people will soon hear for themselves in open hearings how the President abused his power & endangered our national security for personal gain. #TruthExposed

It’s difficult to defend the indefensible. The President’s own top diplomats & national security experts are corroborating the mounting evidence that Trump abused his power for personal gain. #TruthExposed
This was long overdue. As today’s ruling shows, the White House had no right to block @HouseJudiciary’s requests. I suspect we will soon have even more proof of this Administration’s misconduct.

Last year, San Jose joined several cities across the country to mourn the 11 innocent Americans murdered at the Tree of Life synagogue. This weekend, let us come together again to honor the victims & reaffirm that hate has no place in our communities. #ShowUpForShabbat

Instead of capitulating to Erdogan, Trump should: 1. Sanction Turkish officials responsible for these atrocities. 2. Stop selling arms to Turkey for use in Syria. 3. Revoke visas of Erdogan’s bodyguards who assaulted protestors on US soil. 4. Recognize the Armenian genocide.

Trump’s cowardly appeasement of authoritarian strongmen is emboldening Erdogan to act with impunity. The US is supposed to condemn bad actors when they violate human rights & kill our allies, not aid & abet them.

Talked impeachment on @MorningJoe. As I said to @MorningMika, a lot of the info is in plain sight. The Pres. may have his own reality, but there are actual facts. @HouseDemocrats are working #ForThePeople, #ForTheFacts. #TruthExposed #SHIELDAct

We are debating the #SHIELDAct on the House Floor right now. This critical election security bill cracks down on foreign meddling in American elections & is expected to pass the House shortly. @HouseDemocrats continue fighting #ForThePeople. The Senate should follow our lead.
Protecting American elections from foreign interference cannot wait. Congress needs to pass my #SHIELDAct now. I explain why on @SXMPOTUS @MorningBriefing

Just as America's election security is being compromised by adversaries abroad, our fundamental right to vote is being undermined here at home. @HouseJudiciary must pass the #VotingRights Advancement Act to prohibit the disenfranchisement of Americans. #VRAA

Trump’s campaign shared internal polling data with a Russian operative & the Russians then used Facebook’s geographic targeting features to hit Americans in specific locations with political ads. This info sharing should be illegal. It would be with my #SHIELDACT.

We were joined by @DOJ @FBI @DHS & @EAC witnesses at today’s @HouseJudiciary #ElectionSecurity hearing. @HouseDemocrats are investigating & moving proposals simultaneously. Next up: #SHIELDAct w/bipartisan reforms to improve our elections’ defenses against foreign interference.

Presidential campaigns shouldn’t be briefing Russian operatives on their election strategy & internal polling data, but that’s exactly what Trump’s own campaign chairman did in 2016. My #SHIELDAct cracks down on this info-sharing to keep foreign governments out of our democracy.
No.

The @HispanicCaucus, @HouseJudiciary & @HomelandDems are demanding an investigation into this dangerous policy. We will fight to ensure vulnerable families are treated humanely & receive access to legal representation & translators.

The U.S. is legally obligated to thoroughly review asylum claims from families threatened with violence & murder in their home countries. The Trump Admin is unlawfully funneling people into tent courts where their due process rights are violated. It's cruel & unacceptable.

"The Constitution’s framers envisioned America’s political leaders as bound by a devotion to country above all else...By protecting Donald Trump at all costs from all consequences, the Republicans risk violating that sacred oath."
Couldn’t agree more. Thanks @Tim_Cook for urging the Senate to pass our bipartisan bill.

Trump hosting the #G7 summit at his own property is a blatant #EmolumentsClause violation. How can he accuse others of conflicts of interest when he consistently uses the office of the presidency for self-enrichment? They aren't even trying to hide the corruption anymore.

I consider myself honored to have worked with Elijah Cummings for more than 20 years in Congress. @RepCummings refused to accept injustices & stood up for our core American values until the very end. Our country has lost a champion.
All I see is the only woman at the table literally standing up to a bully.

We cannot let foreign entities launder money & sow disinformation in our elections. It's the solemn duty of Congress to defend our democracy from these threats. Today, @HouseAdm_Dems passed my bill, the #SHIELDAct, to promote transparency & close gaps in our election laws.

The Russian military is now in Northern Syria - while our U.S. tactical nukes (at a base in Turkey) are unsecured & our troops are isolated & in danger. All because of the pullout ordered by Trump. It makes me wonder: whose team is @RealDonaldTrump on?

Democracy in #HongKong is under threat by the Chinese government. Today, the House of Representatives stands w/ #HongKongers by reaffirming U.S. commitment to their rights & suspending crowd control equipment sales to the police who are brutally targeting peaceful protesters.

Two years ago #MeToo sparked a national conversation about workplace harassment & sexual misconduct. Since then, we’ve reformed workplace protections afforded to congressional staff & interns to ensure that every survivor on Capitol Hill is heard. We can & must do better.

Attention CA-19 innovators: My office is accepting submissions for the 2019 Congressional App Challenge, an incredible opportunity for Santa Clara County students interested in pursuing careers in computer science. Visit https://lofgren.house.gov/services/app-challenge for more.

This is the 4th DHS Secretary to leave the Trump Admin. The latest instrument in advancing the immoral family separation policy. What does America really need? A leader who upholds the rule of law, stands up to the President & works w/Congress in a productive & bipartisan way.

Trump’s rule would have discriminated against working class families, undermined legal immigration & harmed the nation’s public health. Pleased to see the Court uphold the rule of law & halt this unlawful regulation. More http://bit.ly/319wOdA
This #NationalComingOutDay, I’m celebrating all who have made the brave decision to live openly & I support those that are still on their own important journey to be who they are.

Another reason why Congress must strengthen our laws against foreign interference in our elections. The #SHIELDAct will end laundering of foreign money in US elections, improve transparency & create a duty to report illicit offers of campaign assistance.

Proud to be leading this effort to make sure the interference we saw in 2016 doesn't happen again. Step : @HouseDemocrats passed our #SAFEAct to protect U.S. election infrastructure Step : Proposing the #SHIELDAct
Honored to have this important issue covered as your first for the San Jose beat, @izziemae.

Today, #SCOTUS will consider whether LGBTQ workers can be legally fired because of who they are & who they love. It’s clear to me that no one should be treated as less than equal under the law. The civil rights of *every* American must be guaranteed. #RiseUpOct8 #TitleVII

.@EPAAWheeler: Stop your hypocritical attacks on California. Instead of polluting the mission statement of the @EPA, you should work with us to protect public health. Our CA letter w/ more http://bit.ly/31T4IV3

Today, we filed a bicameral, bipartisan amicus brief in support of #DACA to #SCOTUS. Pres. Trump put the fate of 800K young people in the hands of the Supreme Court & now our justices must join us on the right side of history. More https://lofgren.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressional-leaders-file-bipartisan-amicus-brief-support-daca-supreme-court

.@RealDonaldTrump’s repeated efforts to enlist foreign help in meddling with our country’s elections underscores the urgency for anti-corruption & election security reform. It’s been 200 days since the House passed the #ForThePeopleAct. @SenateMajLdr: Do your job & vote on HR 1.

This lawless approach undermines our ability to conduct meaningful congressional oversight of US refugee policy, which is particularly egregious in light of the global crisis. There are more refugees now than any time since WWII. Trump must abandon his dangerous proposal.

Late last night, Trump again ignored the law by quietly issuing historically low US refugee admissions numbers for 2020 without even consulting Congress, which is required by statute. This is an affront to our nation’s values.

If a 19-year-old from Gilroy can cross state lines into Nevada to buy a weapon of war banned in his home state & kill children, California's gun laws alone aren’t sufficient. We must reauthorize the federal #AssaultWeaponsBan to protect all of our communities from gun violence.

After the #GilroyShooting, family-friendly events planned for the weekend were cancelled. People were afraid to leave their homes. Gun violence harms entire communities. Today, @HouseJudiciary held a hearing to review how to make our communities safer from assault weapons.
A formal impeachment inquiry should be undertaken in the House of Representatives. My full statement:

Today @RepBera & I led @HouseJudiciary & @HouseForeign committees’ first ever joint hearing on Trump’s #MuslimBan. This Administration must answer for its discriminatory policy, which has kept families apart for years, & hear from those who were harmed by the chaos they created.

I’m deeply troubled by reports of detentions without due process and communications blockades in Kashmir. The US must speak out against this human rights crisis. India can and must do better to ensure that freedoms for all its citizens are upheld.

Today I demanded that EPA Administrator Wheeler answer for the Administration’s unprecedented attack on the Clean Air Act. By threatening auto-makers reaching a vehicle emissions agreement with CA, Trump has thrown our state’s clean air policies & the auto industry into chaos.

This is another politically motivated attack on California for pioneering strong environmental policies. Revoking our right to set tougher auto emission standards is a blow to public health and the will of California voters.

High-capacity magazines are banned in CA, but the #GilroyShooting perpetrator still bought them by crossing state lines. Three people would still be alive today if they were banned nationally. @HouseJudiciaryDems & I passed @RepTedDeutch's #KeepAmericansSafe Act to do just that.

State gun safety laws alone can’t prevent all mass shootings. The #GilroyShooting perpetrator avoided CA gun laws by buying his weapon in Nevada. Proud to support @RepCarbajal & @RepLucyMcBath in their efforts to extend effective state gun laws to the federal level.

My colleagues & I on the Gun Violence Prevention Task Force just held a forum with @SpeakerPelosi & Chairman @RepThompson demanding the Senate act on gun safety bills passed by the House. No community should experience the tragedy endured by my constituents at the #GilroyShooting

The Trump administration has failed to effectively manage the humanitarian crisis at the border as it continues to mistreat families and put them in danger. I will continue to fight in Congress to hold this Administration accountable for its destructive immigration policies.

The President’s “Remain in Mexico” policy forces vulnerable families to stay in dangerous conditions similar to those they fled, all while they are funneled into a chaotic system that can make them miss their asylum hearing through no fault of their own.

2 years ago, President Trump moved to end #DACA, uprooting the lives of 800k #Dreamers who enrich our communities & are American in every way except on paper. As we fight to #ProtectTheDream in Congress, recipients must keep their DACA benefits up to date.

Pleased to join today the FTA Acting Administrator and Silicon Valley stakeholders to announce a federal funding award to VTA for the BART Extension Phase 2 project that will extend service from Berryessa via Alum Rock into downtown San Jose.

A milestone for flood protection in Morgan Hill & San Martin! The Upper Llagas Creek project is a big priority for me and I’ve been engaged with moving it forward because will positively impact thousands of homes, acres of farmland, and hundreds of businesses in South County.
I am stunned and outraged that Israel, our supposed ally, is barring entry to duly elected Members of the House of Representatives.

The tragic shootings in Gilroy, CA; El Paso, TX; Dayton, OH; & Chicago, IL are part of an epidemic of gun violence in our country that must end. The House already passed #HR8 160+ days ago to save lives by requiring background checks for all gun sales. @SenateGOP: #DoSomething.

This rule discriminates against working class families and undermines legal immigration. Most of our ancestors came to this country with nothing, but @POTUS wants the USA open only to wealthy and connected families like his.

Thank you to everyone who has worked heroically to support those affected by the #GilroyShooting. Your generosity is heartwarming. https://www.kqed.org/news/11764672/what-you-need-to-know-gilroy-garlic-festival-victims-services-resources-and-property-recovery-info

The Family Assistance Center has also extended its operations to help those affected at Rucker Elementary School. Services provided include free childcare as well as grief counseling & emotional support. Find out more below https://www.sccgov.org/sites/da/newsroom/newsreleases/Pages/NRA2019/FAC.aspx

Foothill Community Health Center is offering support & counseling services for those affected. Call 408-755-3905 or walk-in to either clinic at these locations: 9460 No Name Uno, #110 Gilroy, CA 95020 Mon-Fri 8AM-7PM 2680 S. White Rd., #260 San Jose, CA 95148 Mon-Fri 8AM-5PM

It is vital that we come together as a community to support those affected by the #GilroyShooting and provide them with the affection and professional assistance they need. Please share this thread with the rest of the Bay Area community.

My joint statement with @RepJimmyPanetta on the #GilroyShooting: https://lofgren.house.gov/joint-statement-gilroy Please share these important resources with members of the community affected by this tragedy.
Standing in solidarity with @GilroyPD at their press conference to update our community on the #Gilroy Shooting. Watch here.
I am heartbroken over the innocent lives lost and outraged that this violence has happened in our community at a time when families and neighbors were enjoying the annual #GilroyGarlicFestival .
TY first responders for helping the victims at the festival shooting. If looking for a loved one, please go to the reunification center at Gavilan College at parking lot B.

We know the Trump campaign shared internal polling data with Russians in 2016. We don’t know who requested that it be shared with them or why. DOJ must give Congress the full, unredacted Mueller report & underlying evidence so we can get these answers.

Thanks @Slate for highlighting this key piece of information from my questioning of Former Special Counsel Mueller. The Russians actively worked toward a Trump victory in 2016 and even discussed campaign strategy with Trump’s campaign manager Paul Manafort. #MuellerHearings

Mueller told me and my @HouseJudiciary colleagues that Russia attacked our democracy in a “systemic and sweeping fashion” to help the Trump campaign, and the campaign welcomed their help. @realDonaldTrump, this interference should ALWAYS be reported to the FBI. #MuellerHearings

Some of my colleagues like Rep. @Ilhan Omar receive death threats multiple times a week. When @realDonaldTrump invokes racist rhetoric against elected officials, he emboldens bigots to act on their hateful beliefs. This needs to stop.”

My @HouseJudiciary colleagues and I just passed @CongressmanRuiz's bill to improve conditions of migrant families in CBP custody by ensuring that their most basic needs are met, including clean water, healthy food, and adequate shelter. Children cannot keep dying in U.S. custody.

Today the House passed a resolution I cosponsored condemning President Trump’s bigoted and reprehensible remarks against my colleagues. When the President of the United States invokes racist tropes to ignite fear and divide the nation, Congress must speak out as loudly as we can.

Yesterday the Assistant DHS Inspector General testified before my subcommittee about dangerous conditions migrant families are subjected to in Border Patrol custody. Her report was disturbing, but not surprising, to me & my @HouseJudiciary colleagues who visited CBP facilities.

The Trump Administration must answer for its unlawful and cruel immigration policies. That’s why I’m holding an oversight hearing today on Border Patrol’s inhumane detainment of migrant families. It’s abusive to children and must be stopped. Watch NOW at
POTUS is an ignorant bigot trying to delegitimize duly elected Members of Congress based on ethnicity and gender. President Trump shames our country.

Today, @HouseJudiciary authorized subpoenas so Congress can hold the Trump Administration accountable for unconscionable policies at the border and its potential crimes related to the Mueller Report. Simply put, the American public deserves answers.

It was a pleasure to meet with San Jose constituents in DC for the annual BPSOS Vietnam Human Rights Advocacy Day and discuss improving both U.S.-Vietnam relations as well as human rights conditions in Vietnam.

The House passed @RepKenBuck’s and my bipartisan bill to make our visa system fairer for skilled immigrants legally working in the US. #HR1044 has 200+ Dem and 100+ GOP cosponsors. If @POTUS is serious about merit-based legal immigration, he should help usher this bill into law.

America’s elections are at the very core of our democracy. We must do all we can to ensure they truly represent the will of the people. Proud to know we’ve taken important steps in protecting our national security with passing the #SAFEAct last week.

I’m proud that the House passed my bill, the #SAFEAct, to protect our elections from foreign attacks by updating our vulnerable & outdated voting systems. Now @Senatemajldr McConnell must put Americans first, and politics aside, by passing this important election security bill.

Trump’s chaotic policies have exacerbated the US border situation, causing death and unforgivable conditions for migrants. If the Executive fails, Congress must act. My new bill would address root causes of the refugee crisis before it reaches the border.

If #SCOTUS won’t fight to protect Americans’ votes, I will. Today I am reintroducing my bill that would end partisan gerrymandering by requiring all states to establish independent redistricting commissions to redraw lines that disenfranchise voters.

One year ago today, #SCOTUS shamefully upheld the President’s policy of excluding immigrants based on their religion. This #MuslimBan is unconstitutional, un-American, and must be overturned. As a cosponsor of the #NoBanAct, I will keep fighting against bigotry and islamophobia.

Happy to join @SpeakerPelosi & @SenSchumer today to discuss the #SAFEAct, my bill to protect our elections from foreign interference. The Mueller Report declared that Russia targeted election administration officials across the US in 2016. We can’t let that happen again in 2020.

Congress must act when the President welcomes foreign attacks on our elections. That is why @HouseAdm_Dems passed my bill today, the #SAFEAct, to protect our democracy and enhance our election security.
It is ridiculous—and without basis in law—for the White House to claim that former Presidential advisors are “completely immune” from answering @HouseJudiciary questions.

We #StandWithRefugees because their courage inspires us, their presence enriches us, and their struggles motivate us to be the nation we were founded to be. On #WorldRefugeeDay we must continue to uphold our country’s dedication to freedom and respect for human dignity. #WRD2019

Millions of Sudanese citizens accomplished what was once unthinkable by ending the 30-year rule of dictator al-Bashir & paving the way for democratic government. Sudan’s military is now undermining progress by hording power & killing protesters. We can’t let this stand.
President Trump’s willingness to accept foreign help for his 2020 campaign is a green light to America’s adversaries to meddle in our elections. It’s wrong and dangerous.

Congress can't conduct effective oversight of the Executive without the evidence that underlies the Mueller Report. Thank you @Lawrence for having me on @TheLastWord to discuss DOJ turning it over so @HouseJudiciary can investigate the President with the facts we’re entitled to.

Congress won a great victory today when the Justice Department caved, giving us the evidence of the Mueller Report we need to determine the truth behind the President’s actions and if he committed a crime.

90 Americans are killed by guns every day. We can’t afford to ignore the scale of this uniquely American epidemic anymore. On #GunViolenceAwarenessDay, let’s support commonsense solutions to #EndGunViolence, including funds for dedicated gun violence prevention research.

On the #DDay75thAnniversary, we commemorate the world’s greatest generation of heroes who were willing to sacrifice everything on the beaches of Normandy to protect our freedom and democracy. We remember the contributions of all who served, and honor their legacy.

Today, the House took an historic step toward enacting #HR6, which would finally prevent the deportation of #Dreamers, who came to this country as children, and who are American in every way except on paper. #ProtectTheDream
#Dreamers have waited long enough: It's time for us to pass #HR6 the Dream and Promise Act in the House of Representatives. #ProtectTheDream

Congress just passed a disaster relief package for Americans hurt by flooding and wildfires, including those in California. Disaster relief should never become politicized or stalled. I’m thankful Congress finally got this done for our constituents still suffering.

Many members of Congress and many members of the public are frustrated and concerned about @POTUS’ behavior. Congress will continue to gather evidence and go to court to enforce our subpoenas of the underlying documents and fact witnesses from the Mueller Investigation.

Trump’s plan to impose tariffs on Mexico is legally dubious and will likely be challenged in court. It also misses the point. No amount of punitive actions will stop people from fleeing for their lives. This would hurt both of our economies and exacerbate migration to the USA.

Based on Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s public statement, it is evident that his investigative team could not exonerate the President from obstruction and that, further, Congress has the responsibility and the right to continue investigating this allegation. My full statement:

Today marks the 10th year of Tran Huynh Duy Thuc’s wrongful imprisonment by the Vietnamese Government for being critical of its authoritarian policies. I will continue to fight for his immediate release and others who have had their rights suppressed.

It's heartbreaking that 6 children have died after being held in US custody at the border. That is unacceptable. To prevent future tragedies, the White House must address the #refugee crisis at its origins in Central America before it comes to our border.

I've worked on two prior impeachments, so this isn’t my first rodeo when it comes to misbehavior in the White House. This Administration is in an untenable position, since there is no basis to the President’s belief that his aides can stonewall the @HouseJudiciary.

I urge @HouseJudiciary to vote for the #DreamAct so we can take the first steps toward giving Dreamers the lawful permanent residence and peace of mind they deserve. We all benefit from their intelligence, hard work, and patriotism.

100 years ago today, the House passed the 19th Amendment giving women the right to vote. As we celebrate our #SuffrageSisters and honor their sacrifices, we cannot let their pursuit of equality go unfinished or allow it to be reversed. Representation matters. #WomensVote100

There is no basis in law for the President’s claim that his aides don’t have to testify before Congress. @HouseJudiciary will hear Mr. McGahn’s testimony, even if we need a court order to enforce our subpoena.

In passing the #EqualityAct today, my colleagues and I voted to guarantee the civil rights of every American regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity. We’re now one step closer to fulfilling our nation’s promise as the land of freedom and opportunity for all Americans.
Nearly 9 in 10 Americans support letting #Dreamers stay in this country. This is not a divisive issue. Any proposal that doesn’t protect #DACA recipients from deportation is a non-starter.

The White House plan wrongly treats immigration as a zero-sum game. It would gut our family immigration system while ignoring the plight of undocumented immigrants. Instead, the President should work with Congress on a bipartisan solution.

The unconstitutional #AlabamaAbortionBan, passed by an all-male majority, has no exceptions for rape or incest. This unconscionable, near-total ban is the latest Republican assault on reproductive rights. I will fight to defend #RoeVWade & protect access to safe, legal abortions.

Congratulations to Shreya Anbalagan, a freshman at Evergreen Valley High School and this year’s Congressional Art Competition Winner for CA-19. Her impressive oil painting, titled “Peckuliarity,” depicts a blue cassowary and will be displayed in a hallway to the U.S. Capitol.

Thank you @GavinNewsom for standing with California’s Cambodian refugee community. The Trump administration must reverse course on its callous policy of ordering members of our communities to be sent to countries replete with human rights abuses.

California is bracing for a potentially record-breaking fire season. Communities still recovering from devastating wildfires and flooding can’t afford the @SenateGOP delaying the bipartisan emergency disaster relief bill the House passed today.

I’ve voted to protect millions of Americans from GOP attempts to sabotage the #ACA more than 60 times. Today I am voting again to #ProtectOurCare from Trump’s latest effort to discriminate against those with pre-existing conditions.
AG Barr is in contempt of Congress because his stonewalling of the @HouseJudiciary Committee violates the Constitution’s system of checks and balances. This obstruction must have consequences.
My Town Hall on #HR1 is underway, you can tune in here: https://youtu.be/18pYKo60x-M #ForThePeople
I'm holding a Town Hall Meeting on #HR1, the #ForThePeople Act, the most sweeping ethics and government reform bill passed by the House in a generation. You can watch live here:

Please RSVP for my Town Hall in San Jose tomorrow, May 4, at https://lofgren.house.gov/RSVP for a conversation about #HR1, which will make our elections more secure and accessible. #ZoeTownHall #ForThePeopleAct

I told #CNN it’s unacceptable AG Barr refuses to share the full Mueller Report; abdicating his responsibility to the rule of law. Our Founders demanded checks and balances. But Barr is acting like the President’s personal lawyer. Americans deserve better.

Did you know that LGBT Americans can still legally be fired for their sexual orientation? That cannot continue. That's why I voted today to move the #EqualityAct one step closer to becoming law to ensure that every American can live freely and without fear

I support the #ClimateActionNow Act because America can’t afford to trail the rest of the world in solving the climate crisis. Instead of abandoning the #ParisAgreement, we must lead in transitioning to a clean energy economy to create jobs and protect our future #ActOnClimate

I want to send my best wishes to my friends and neighbors who will march today in San Jose for #MayDay to resist discrimination against immigrants and refugees and any efforts to keep our country from meeting its promise as the land of the free.

Please join me this Saturday, May 4, for a conversation about #HR1, the most significant government reform package since Watergate. Please RSVP at https://lofgren.house.gov/RSVP #ForThePeople #ZoeTownHall

Survivors deserve to be heard. That’s why I made it a priority to introduce and pass a Sexual Assault Survivors’ Bill of Rights. Since this law was enacted almost half of the states have followed suit. No one should be revictimized by a broken legal system. #DenimDay #SAAPM
It’s clear that this is not a good report for the President or for Attorney General Barr. My full statement:
Great to meet with @CAL_FIRE Local 2881 to discuss firefighting issues in Santa Clara County.
I'm proud to stand with @HouseDemocrats in supporting the #EqualityAct. It's time to end discrimination against LGBTQ Americans! #HR5
Fairness & equality are core American values. We should make sure they are the law of the land as well by passing #HR5 and protecting #LGBTQ Americans from discrimination.

I am proud to be an original cosponsor of the Save the Internet Act and look forward to working with my colleagues to ensure that the internet remains the conduit of free speech and innovation it has been since its inception.

"It’s a marker, a bill worth fighting for in the future. Recall that versions of Medicare, the Tennessee Valley Authority and more expansive civil rights proposals all languished in Congress or were defeated before they passed."
READ: @EJDionne column in the @washingtonpost: "H.R. 1 [is] perhaps the most comprehensive political-reform proposal ever considered by our elected representatives"

Kicking off this historic week for @HouseDemocrats testifying in support of #HR1. I’m proud to be the Chairperson of the primary committee of jurisdiction for this groundbreaking package of democracy reforms, voting rights protections and increased ethics standards.#ForThePeople
